source:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_00<tab>Alpa and J'olhmyn are formulating a plan, but what could it be?
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
カステッルム・ベロジナのアルパは、冒険者のことを待っているようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_01<tab>Castellum Velodyna has undergone a dramatic transformation due to Alpa's ingenuity and ability to inspire others─although she would be the first to admit that none of this would have been possible without the loyal comrades at her side. In order to express her gratitude, she plans to hold a feast for a handful of her most steadfast supporters. After placing Gales in charge of procuring food and drink, she tasks you with delivering invitations to M'zhet Tia and Tahla Molkoh.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストには
「<var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

アルパと話した。これまで力を貸してくれた者たちを呼んで、慰労会を行おうとしているようだ。ピーリングストーンズの「メ・ゼト・ティア」と、カストルム・オリエンスの「タラ・モルコー少牙士」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFE01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_02<tab>M'zhet Tia welcomes you with a broad smile and jumps at the chance of enjoying fine cuisine and fine company, especially since J'olhmyn will be attending. His response is in stark contrast to that of Tahla Molkoh, to whom the idea of eating anywhere other than a mess hall conjures images of stuffy high society banquets. She nonetheless accepts the invitation despite her concerns that she might commit some sort of social blunder.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_02<tab>メ・ゼト・ティアとタラ・モルコー少牙士に、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFE01 /var>を渡した。カステッルム・ベロジナに戻り、「アルパ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_03<tab>Before you can speak at length with Alpa and J'olhmyn upon your return to the castellum, you hear sounds of distress from beyond the gate, prompting the captain to rush off by herself to investigate. In her absence, J'olhmyn confides that she has noticed a significant change in Alpa of late, and suggests taking this opportunity to watch the leader of the Gatekeepers at work.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_03<tab>アルパに報告した。関所の外で何かが起こっているようだ。カステッルム・ベロジナのアルパと話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_04<tab>You and J'olhmyn meet Alpa outside the gates, where a man is recounting how he barely escaped from a ravenous woodland predator. There was a time when Alpa would have relied on you to eliminate such threats, but she has grown into a confident and capable battlemaid, and does not hesitate to take matters into her own hands. She makes for the forest with one of her new Qalyana allies at her side, leaving J'olhmyn to watch the castellum. Some time later, Alpa returns having slain the fiend, and it becomes clear that she has taken to the role of captain with aplomb.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_04<tab>アルパと話した。初めて出会った頃と比べて、アルパは、国境警備隊警備隊長として立派に成長したようだ。カステッルム・ベロジナにいるアルパと再度話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_05<tab>Finally, Alpa gathers the guests for the long-awaited feast. Before the meal, M'zhet finds himself dragged into a drinking contest with Gales, which quickly takes a turn for the worse as the young tia has an immediate and disastrous reaction to the spirits. Thankfully, this has little bearing on the proceedings, and shortly thereafter a sumptuous selection of culinary delights is laid out for all to enjoy, including a miraculously recovered M'zhet. The room is soon filled with conversation and laughter until Alpa rises to give a heartfelt speech, thanking her companions for their loyalty and friendship. She reaffirms her commitment to leading the Gatekeepers, while J'olhmyn pledges to support her as they continue their work at Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SEQ_05<tab>アルパは、国境警備隊と、協力してくれた者たちは、アラミゴという国に生きる仲間であり、家族であると話した。種の壁を越え、多くの仲間と出会って繋いだ絆が、これからもアラミゴの国境を守り続けていくことだろう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Alpa's invitation to M'zhet Tia in the Peering Stones.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_00<tab>ピーリングストーンズのメ・ゼト・ティアに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFE01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_01<tab>Deliver Alpa's invitation to Tahla Molkoh in Castrum Oriens.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_01<tab>カストルム・オリエンスのタラ・モルコー少牙士に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DFE01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alpa at Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_02<tab>カステッルム・ベロジナのアルパに報告

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Alpa.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_03<tab>アルパと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Alpa again.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TODO_04<tab>アルパと再度話す

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_001<tab>Oh, there you are! You're jussst in time.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_001<tab>しゅ～……<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>か。
待っておったぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_200_001<tab>Gales! We need you too!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_200_001<tab>ゲイルス！
おぬしもこっちに来るのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_001<tab>I'm hosssting a feast for a few friends of the Gatekeepers. It's a small show of thanks for all your sssupport.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_001<tab>これで全員揃ったようじゃな。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_002<tab>Of course, you're all invited, but I'll need sssome help.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_002<tab>実はな、これまで力を貸してくれた者たちを呼んで、
簡単ではあるが、慰労会を行おうと思っておってな。
そこで、おぬしらに手伝ってもらいたいことがあるのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_002<tab>Gales, could you take care of the food and drink?
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_002<tab>まずはゲイルス、
おぬしには、宴に出す料理を作ってもらいたい。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_005<tab>Leave it to me. You can expect the finest cuisine Eorzea has to offer!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_005<tab>承知しました……。
ぐふふふふふ……愛のこもったごちそうを作らなければ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_200_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, could I ask you to deliver these invitations?
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_200_002<tab>次に、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃ。
慰労会には、おぬしの友人にも出席してもらいたくてな、
これから話す2名に、招待状を届けてほしいのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_003<tab>There's one for M'zhet Tia and another for Tahla Molkoh.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_003<tab>招待状を渡す相手は、
ピーリングストーンズの「メ・ゼト・ティア」と、
カストルム・オリエンスの「タラ・モルコー少牙士」の両名じゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_004<tab>In the meantime, J'olhmyn and I will ssstart getting the place ready.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_004<tab>その間に、わらわたちは会場の準備をしておく。
ふたりとも、すまんが頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Up for another adventure, eh?
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_010<tab>師匠！　オレに会いに来てくれたんですか！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_011<tab>Ha ha! Alpa's full of surprises! And I assume J'olhmyn will be there too?
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_011<tab>へえ、慰労会かぁ……。
アルパの奴、粋なことするじゃねーか！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_012<tab>I wouldn't miss it for the world! I'll meet you there soon.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_012<tab>もちろん、参加しますよ！
準備してから向かうので、師匠は現地で待っていてください！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_013<tab>Greetings! What brings you to Castrum Oriens today?
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_013<tab>……はい？　私に渡したいものがあると？

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_014<tab>A banquet? It sounds a lot more fancy than the mess hall grub I'm used to.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_014<tab>国境警備隊から慰労会のお誘いですか……。
人づきあいが苦手なので、そのような催しに出るのは心配ですが、
楽しそうなので、この機会に参加してみます。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_015<tab>Before I attend, I must consult my tomes on Gyr Abanian etiquette. I shall join you anon.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_015<tab>さて、淑女たる者、公の場に出るための用意をしなければ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんは、
先に会場へ戻ってください。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_020<tab>This is my first time hosssting a dinner party. I didn't invite many people in case it all goes horribly wrong!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_020<tab>招待状を渡してほしい相手は、
ピーリングストーンズの「メ・ゼト・ティア」、
カストルム・オリエンスの「タラ・モルコー少牙士」の2名じゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_030<tab>According to J'olhmyn, my cooking “looks like it's been scraped off a tavern floor,” whatever that's supposed to mean...
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_030<tab>その間に、わらわたちは準備をしておく。
すまんが、頼んだぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_025<tab>(Alpa's really been getting into the role of captain lately. Don't tell her I said this, but I'm quite impressed!)
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_025<tab>アルパ、いつになく張り切ってるねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_026<tab>It's been a while since I had the opportunity to demonstrate my culinary prowess. I'm rather looking forward to it!
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_026<tab>宴なんて、いつ以来ですかね……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_040<tab>They accepted our invitations?
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_040<tab>しゅ～……招待状を渡してきてくれたのじゃな、礼を言うぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_041<tab>Did you hear that? It sounds like there's a commotion outssside the gate. I'd better deal with this before the meal.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_041<tab>戻ってきて早々じゃが、何やら関所の外が騒がしくてな。
宴の前に、ひと仕事する必要がありそうじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_300_041<tab>Just between you and me, Alpa's really come into her own since that incident with the Qalyana. Why don't you go and see for yourself?
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_300_041<tab>さて、オレたちも向かうとしようかねぇ。
現在のアルパの仕事ぶりを、英雄殿に見てもらいたいしねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_200_041<tab>Sometimes it's nice to just forget about our duties and wash down a hearty meal with a bottle or three of arak. It sounds like we've got work to do first, though!
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_200_041<tab>たまには、仕事を忘れて宴に興ずる……とはいかないようだねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_042<tab>What happened?
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_042<tab>しゅ～……おぬし、その怪我はどうしたのじゃ？

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TRAVELLER03041_100_042<tab>I was passin' through the woods when some sort of monster grabbed me from the bushes! Damn near pulled my arm off! I didn't stick around to see what it was, I just made a run for it!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TRAVELLER03041_100_042<tab>ああ……国境警備隊か、助かった……。
実は、ここに来る途中で魔物に襲われちまって、
命からがら逃げて来たってわけさ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_200_042<tab>You're in the care of the Gatekeepers now. Ressst well. We will look into this.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_200_042<tab>それは大変な目に遭ったのう。
じゃが、もう安心してよいぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_300_042<tab>J'olhmyn, help him to the infirmary and see that his chocobo is looked after.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_300_042<tab>オルミン、負傷者の受け入れ準備を整えるよう、診療所に連絡を！
弱ったチョコボは、チョコボ留で休ませてやるのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_400_042<tab>There may be others who've been attacked. Send a griffin rider to survey the area!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_400_042<tab>他にも魔物に襲われた者がおるかもしれん！
グリフィン騎兵を出動させ、空から捜索させよ！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_100<tab>Understood! Come along, sir. The chirurgeons will take care of that arm.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_100<tab>さあ、ついといで。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_600_042<tab>Normally I'd ask you to assist in culling wild beasts, but we can handle thisss.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_600_042<tab>おぬしは、ここで待っていてほしいのじゃ。
これは、我ら国境警備隊の成長ぶりを見せる絶好の機会、
いつまでも、おぬしに頼っておるわけにはいかぬのじゃからな！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_500_042<tab>It can't have gone far. Let's move out!
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_500_042<tab>さあ、魔物の討伐へ向かうぞ！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_101<tab>That poor bloke and his chocobo should be fine now. There don't seem to have been any other casualties, so let's just wait for Alpa to get back.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_101<tab>ふぅ、こっちの仕事は終わったよ。
他に魔物に襲われた者もいないようだし、
あとはアルパの帰りを待つだけだねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_700_042<tab>We finally found the culprit. It didn't put up much of a fight.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_700_042<tab>しゅぅ～……ようやく片付いたのじゃ。
ふたりとも、待たせてすまんのう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_Q2_000_000<tab>アルパになんと言う？

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_A2_000_001<tab>You've become quite the battlemaid.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_A2_000_001<tab>成長したな

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_A2_000_002<tab>Not afraid to get your hands dirty, are you?
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_A2_000_002<tab>いつの間にか終わってた

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_800_042<tab>Ha ha, high praise indeed coming from you!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_800_042<tab>しゅっしゅっしゅ……そう言ってくれるか。
おぬしに褒められるとは、面映ゆいのう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_900_042<tab>I'm only trying to lead by example. I can't delegate everything, you know!
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_900_042<tab>しゅっしゅっしゅ……出会った頃より、少しは成長したじゃろう？

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_950_042<tab>In the beginning, I wasn't sure you'd make much of a captain. But much to my surprise, you're not all that terrible!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_950_042<tab>副官に任命された時は、どうなることかと思ってたけど……
立派になったよ、アンタ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_990_042<tab>Hmph! A backhanded compliment if ever there was one, but I'll take it.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_990_042<tab>しゅしゅ！？
まさかオルミンにまで褒められるとは……
脱皮の時期まで日があるのに、何やらむずがゆくなってきたぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_200_043<tab>Anyway, we have a few things to prepare for the feast. Our guests will be here sssoon.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_200_043<tab>さて、それでは関所に戻るとするのじゃ。
宴の参加者たちが到着する前に、準備を終えなければならぬ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TRAVELLER03041_300_043<tab><pant> My heart's still racing!
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TRAVELLER03041_300_043<tab>はぁ……はぁ……酷い目に遭った……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_400_043<tab>Not sure what happened, but he looks a bit worse for wear.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_400_043<tab>どうやら、帰国途中のアラミゴ人のようだねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_KARYANASOLDIER_500_043<tab>To be in the presence of Captain Alpa and the Warrior of Light is an honor indeed.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_KARYANASOLDIER_500_043<tab>シュー……隊長だけでなく、あなたも来てくれるとは、心強い。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_600_43<tab>It sounds like trouble's brewing again... I'd better carry on with my work and leave this “commotion” to you and Alpa.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_600_43<tab>荒事は皆さんにお任せして、
僕は粛々と宴の用意をしていますよ……。
ぐふふふふふ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_043<tab>The meal is almossst ready. I hope you're hungry!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_043<tab>しゅ～……もうすぐ宴の準備が整うのじゃ。
それまでの間、腹を空かして待っておるがよい！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_042<tab>Although you're not officially members of the Velodyna Gatekeepers, J'olhmyn and I want to show our appreciation for your support.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_042<tab>しゅ～……皆の者、よくぞ来てくれたのじゃ。
国境警備隊の任務に協力してくれた外部の者たちを呼んで、
個々の働きを労いたいと、オルミンと話しておったのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_043<tab>I am very grateful for your kind invitation, though I must admit, I am rather unaccustomed to formal dining.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_043<tab>こちらこそ、お誘いいただきありがとうございます。
このような場は初めてなもので、
作法など、どうしてよいやらわかりませんが……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_044<tab>Formal? Forget about that! Just eat, drink, and be merry!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_044<tab>んなもん、関係ねーって！
ひたすら飲んで、食って、楽しんだらいいんだよ！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_045<tab>Drink, eh? We have more than enough if you're interested in a little contest.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_045<tab>おや、酒はイケるクチなのですか、兄弟。
ならば、僕と飲み比べでもしますか？
ぐふふふふふ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_046<tab>Ah... Spirits don't really agree with me...
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_046<tab>いや、実は酒はそれほど……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_047<tab>Come on, M'zhet! Show us what the “future nunh of the M tribe” can do!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_047<tab>偉大なヌンになるんだろ？
男を見せる時だよ、メ・ゼト！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_048<tab>Well, since you put it like that, how can I refuse? Gales─I accept your challenge!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_048<tab>くっ……それを言われちまったら、受けないわけにはいかねえな！
勝負だ、ゲイルス！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_049<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_049<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_100_049<tab>I have a case of vintage arak from Ala Ghiri to get us started.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_100_049<tab>ぐふふふふふ……。
では、先に酒を取ってきましょう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_050<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_050<tab>There's ssso much food, we'll need Gales and M'zhet to tear themselves away from their drinking game to help carry it.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_100_050<tab>しゅ～……宴のために、ゲイルスがご馳走を用意してくれてな。
数が多いゆえ、運ぶのを手伝ってもらいたいのじゃ。
なあに、あやつらの手も借りれば、すぐ終わる……

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_051<tab>M'zhet! Are you all right?
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_051<tab>メ・ゼトさんが倒れました！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_052<tab>Evidently not. I think I've lost my appetite.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_052<tab>こら、メ・ゼト！
ここで吐くんじゃないよ！！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_053<tab>Don't just stand there! Get a mop!
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_053<tab>水を……誰か水をおおおおお！！！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_100_053<tab>Ye gods! How did he get it on the ceiling!?
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_100_053<tab>うわぁ！？
酸っぱい匂いのするものが、こっちに！！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_054<tab>It looks like they're a bit preoccupied...
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_054<tab>しゅ～……仕方ない、料理は我らだけで運ぶとするか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_055<tab>Ahem! I'd like to sssay a few words.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_055<tab>しゅ～……オ、オホン、宴もたけなわといったところじゃが……
なんだかあらたまって話すのは照れるのう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_056<tab>When I was made captain of the Gatekeepers, I had no idea what I was getting myssself into. It wasn't easy at first, but I couldn't be more delighted with how everything has turned out!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_056<tab>……国境警備隊の設立当初、わらわは隊長として未熟じゃったが、
皆の協力のおかげで、母上も認める立派な関所を造ることができた。
種の壁を越え、多くの仲間を得て……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_057<tab>Of course, we couldn't have done any of this without your sssupport. If you ever need anything at all from the Gatekeepers, consssider it done!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_057<tab>わらわたちは、アラミゴという国に生きる仲間であり、家族じゃ。
もしもおぬしらが困ったときは、わらわを頼ってくれ。
必ずや力になってみせるからのう！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_058<tab>The same goes for you! My blade is ever at your service!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_058<tab>困ったことがあれば呼んでくれ！
オレだって、力になるからよ！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_059<tab>I've turned my life around, and it's all thanks to the Gatekeepers! It would be my pleasure to carry on working here.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_059<tab>僕だって。
こんなに楽しい職場は、初めてですから……。
ぐふふふふふ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_060<tab>I have the perfect title for you. How does the “Grand Guardian of Gyr Abania” sound?
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_060<tab>アルパさんの二つ名について考えていたのですが、
ずばり、「橋の上の番犬」というのはどうでしょう。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_061<tab>(That's the worst one yet...)
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_MZHETTIA_000_061<tab>相変わらずダセェな……。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_062<tab>I think I'll stick around as your second-in-command, if you don't mind!
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_062<tab>オレも、副官として、
今後もアルパを支えていくつもりさ。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_Q1_000_000<tab>アルパに何と言う？

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_A1_000_001<tab>We're all very proud of you, Alpa.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_A1_000_001<tab>よく頑張った

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_A1_000_002<tab>You're lucky to have such great friends. Especially me.
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_A1_000_002<tab>これからもよろしく

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_064<tab><sniff> Has someone been cutting onions?
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_ALPA_000_064<tab>じゅ～……
わらわは……みなが大好きじゃ……！！

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_065<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_JOLHMYN_000_065<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_070<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_GALES_000_070<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bloodsworn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Vira.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>「アナンタ族：アルパ国境警備隊」との友好関係が、
「誓約★」になりました。
国境警備隊警備隊長の友人として、固い絆で結ばれたようです。

source: TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>You will receive an experience point bonus upon completion of the Vira tribal daily quests.
target:
TEXT_BANANA006_03041_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>これ以降、「アナンタ族：アルパ国境警備隊」の、
「友好部族デイリークエスト」で獲得できる経験値に、
いっそうのボーナスが付加されます！
